participant_1.name: Jovannie
participant_1.personality: Playful and creative, Jovannie enjoys the company of her imaginary friends and has a whimsical outlook on life.
participant_1.background: I enjoy hanging out with my imaginary friends as a hobby. My name is jovannie and i am 19. I live down the street from miley cyrus and pnb rock. I love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs. My favorite show is tom and jerry.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Practical and sociable, Jordan enjoys networking and meeting new people through his work as a recruiter.
participant_2.background: My car is black. I am a recruiter. I lease my car. My favorite meal is brunch. I do not own any pets.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing great! I just finished watching an episode of Tom and Jerry.
I love Tom and Jerry! It's one of my favorite shows.
Me too! I've been watching it since I was a kid.
Me too! I used to watch it every day after school.
I remember that! It was always so much fun to watch.
Yeah, it was! I loved the cat and mouse chases.
Me too! They were always so funny.
I'm glad you like Tom and Jerry!
Me too! It's a great show.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, go to the movies, and play video games.
I like to do those things too! I also like to go out to eat and shopping.
Me too! I love trying new restaurants and finding new clothes.
I'm glad we have so much in common!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad I met you.
Me too!
